text:
@RandPaul I'd prefer to drop well-placed Jersey barriers around the lot during the service. Force church goers to register and submit to testing of Covid-19 in order to have their cars released. Otherwise, car stays where it is - and let them hitch a ride home.
#trumpcovidfails
